info.title: FormBuilder API
info.description:
FormBuilder API Documentation

This API provides endpoints for managing forms, submissions, and related operations.

Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Use the /api/v1.0/Account/login endpoint to obtain a token.

API Versioning

This API supports versioning via:

  • Query string: ?version=1.0
  • Header: X-Version: 1.0
  • URL path: /api/v1.0/[controller]

Rate Limiting

API requests are rate-limited. Check response headers for rate limit information.

Bearer.description: Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token. Example: 'Bearer 12345abcdef'
Bearer.name: Authorization
